Text: This is crap. Do not download. Some jerk in a cinema with a camera (where's the "CAM" in your title, to warn people?!?!). Quality is AWFUL! Waste of time!

theroyalist... "Where's the cam in the title?"

See the letters "TS"? Well its pretty obvious that you don't know what that means, 'cause otherwise you'd have known it was a cam. That's pretty much what a TS is, albeit with audio from a different source.
